verbs.description: [ARG0: astros] [V: extend] [ARG1: qualifying offer] [ARG3: to dallas keuchel] the houston astros extended a qualifying offer to starting pitcher dallas keuchel on friday ensuring they will receive draft pick compensation if he declines it and leaves in free agency astros announce they 've extended a qualifying offer to dallas keuchel he has until nov 12 to decide if he will accept it houston astros houston dallas keuchel astros astros new york yankees
